name: PumpCallbackArgs
summary: Argument passed to the callback each time the pump operation has new data to deliver.

properties.name: buffer
properties.summary: Buffer object holding the data currently being pumped to the handler method.

properties.name: bytesProcessed
properties.summary: Number of bytes being passed to this invocation of the handler, or -1 in the event of an error or end of stream.

properties.name: code
properties.description: Error code will be 0 if success is true, nonzero otherwise. If the error was generated by the operating system, that system's error value is used. Otherwise, this value will be -1.

deprecated.notes: Use error property to determine error message

properties.name: errorState

deprecated.notes: Use success or code values to determine error conditions

properties.summary: Whether an error was encountered. Set to 1 in the case of an error, 0 otherwise.

properties.name: totalBytesProcessed
properties.summary: Total number of bytes read from the stream so far, including the data passed to this current invocation of the handler.
